subject: Nascar Sprint Cup Series
Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Joey Logano took advantage of a three-car duel among Matt Kenseth, Jeff Gordon and Brad Keselowski by sneaking below them to win a Nascar Sprint Cup race at Richmond (Va.) International Raceway
snippet: Joey Logano took advantage of a three-car duel among Matt Kenseth, Jeff Gordon and Brad Keselowski by sneaking below them to win a Nascar Sprint Cup race at Richmond (Va.) International Raceway
